name: Train Effective
slogan: a world-class sports academy in your pocket
description:
Effective is a mobile training platform allowing athletes to learn and practice as a professional would in a variety of sports.

Whether you’re just starting out or want to take your skills to the next level, drag-and-drop your training schedule, develop with a 4-week technique program or learn tactics and mental skills with from Chelsea and Fulham coaches.

Ignited by a passion for sports and the future of effective learning, Effective is on course (500+ paid subscribers) to take a chunk from the online learning eduTech industry worth 107B globally.

We’re starting with the beautiful game (football) and hiring to launch with teams, coaches and in additional sports.

team.title: Founder & Director
team.name: Nick Humphries
team.bioHtml:
Ideas are shit, execution is the game!
Building TrainEffective.com - a world-class sports academy in your pocket.

team.title: Full Stack Engineer
team.name: Flavio Santa Rosa Coradini
team.bioHtml: I'm a Full Stack Engineer with experience in React, React Native, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL, C#, Firebase and other technologies.

jobs.title: Videographer (Vlog)
jobs.description:
Ever heard of @Drock from Daily Vee? He’s the guy who follows motivational entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk around the world and films/edits his daily vlog.

Here in London, we’re building one of the great stories in sport through Train Effective and are looking for a “Drock” to come vlog and help us create a mini-documentary film everyday. The videographer will be the head of anything video related filming interviews, action clips, matches and just record with us throughout the day. He/she will also have access to an audio engineer, Adobe suite and new iMac. 

Train Effective is a business/brand/new football club with 30k subs on YouTube (growing by 1k every week) and 15 employees (we had 2 last year) that are determined to break the traditional football industry with a new concept.

We don’t care how you look, where you’re from or your age - but if you are looking for the ultimate challenge, got filming/editing skills and willing to sacrifice the short-term for the long-term.. get in touch with a bit about yourself!
